@use JSDoc

@class

Table of Contents

  • Synonyms
  • Syntax
  • Overview
  • Examples
  • Related Links

Synonyms

@constructor

Syntax

@class [<type> <name>]

Overview

The @class tag marks a function as being a constructor, meant to be called with the new keyword to return an instance.

Examples

Related Links
